name: Run Fast, Shoot Hard (Demo)
description:
ENTER THE HARD DRIVE

During a regular day at your IT job, you decide you need some heavy duty defragging action to clean up a hard drive for a client, so you need to go in DEEP.

  • VISIT odd sectors of the hard drive, presenting new locations and challenges.
  • HEAR the sounds of the hard drive (no, not the grinding of a dying storage device) through original music tracks!
  • GAIN bragging rights amongst all of your beloved friends and despised enemies as you improve your time for each sector, developing strategies on how to finish the fastest.
DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO RUN FAST AND SHOOT HARD?!
